title: Bank of Ceylon is Sri Lanka's No. 1 Brand for the ninth consecutive year!
🇱🇰🏦Trainee Staff Assistant Job Vacancies – Bank of Ceylon (BOC) Sri Lanka | 2025 | Sinhala|Apply Now
description:
🏦 Trainee Staff Assistant Job Vacancies – Bank of Ceylon (BOC) Sri Lanka 🇱🇰 | Apply Now Before 2025.05.24!

📢 Join Sri Lanka’s No.1 Bank! The Bank of Ceylon (BOC) is now recruiting Trainee Staff Assistants. If you are young, energetic, and have passed both G.C.E. O/L and A/L exams in one sitting, this is your chance to begin a prestigious and permanent banking career.

🔑 Job Highlights:
✅ Position: Trainee Staff Assistant
✅ Institution: Bank of Ceylon (BOC)
✅ Age Limit: 24 years or below (as of closing date)
✅ Salary:

1st Year: Rs. 55,000/month

2nd Year: Rs. 70,000/month
✅ Closing Date: May 24, 2025
✅ Job Type: Full-Time (Leading to permanent cadre upon completion)

📚 Eligibility Criteria:
✔️ G.C.E. O/L – 6 subjects with at least 5 credit passes, including Sinhala/Tamil, Mathematics & English, in one sitting
✔️ G.C.E. A/L – 3 subjects (excluding General English, General Knowledge, and IT), in one sitting

💼 Key Attributes Required:
🔹 Strong interpersonal & communication skills
🔹 Perseverance, time management, and commitment
🔹 Ability to work flexible hours, including weekends/holidays

📝 Selection Process:
Competitive Written Exam

Paper I: General Knowledge, IQ, IT

Paper II: English Language

Interview for shortlisted candidates

📩 How to Apply:
🔗 Apply only through the official website: www.boc.lk under the “Careers” tab before 24.05.2025
⚠️ Apply for only one province or your application will be disqualified
📎 Keep your “Application Reference Number” safe after submission
📎Advertisement and Instructions link : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1iNhMjbCVYR6hH1gX7PNbiXJ-wjsxHPL7/view?usp=sharing  

🚀 Start your banking career with Bank of Ceylon – Apply Now!

title: How to Find Swift Code of Bank Of Ceylon
description:
Finding the Swift Code for the Bank of Ceylon (BOC) is a simple and efficient process, particularly for those conducting international transactions or needing it for financial documentation. Swift Codes, also known as BICs (Bank Identifier Codes), uniquely identify banks worldwide, ensuring accurate and secure fund transfers.

### Steps to Find the Swift Code for Bank of Ceylon:
1. **Using a Swift Code Finder Tool:**
   - Open your preferred browser and search for “Swift Code Finder.”
   - Select a reliable website from the search results.
   - In the search section, follow these steps:
     - Choose **Sri Lanka** as the country.
     - Select **Bank of Ceylon** from the list of banks.
     - Specify the branch or city, if required, to narrow down the search.
   - The tool will display the relevant Swift Code for the branch you’re searching for.

2. **Visiting the Official Bank of Ceylon Website:**
   - Navigate to the official **Bank of Ceylon** website.
   - Look under the “International Banking” or “Wire Transfers” section. Banks often list their Swift Codes for primary and branch offices there.

3. **General Swift Code for Bank of Ceylon:**
   - The general Swift Code for the Bank of Ceylon’s main branch is **BCEYLKLX**. However, specific branches may have unique codes.

4. **Contacting the Bank:**
   - For accurate information, especially for branch-specific codes, contact the Bank of Ceylon customer service or your local branch directly.

These steps apply not only to the Bank of Ceylon but also to finding Swift Codes for other banks globally.

### Timestamps:
0:00 Introduction  
0:02 Overview of Swift Codes  
0:15 Using Online Swift Code Finder Tools  
0:28 Searching by Country, Bank, and Branch  
0:47 Retrieving the Swift Code  
0:51 Verifying with Bank of Ceylon Website  
0:55 Contacting Bank of Ceylon for Assistance  
0:57 Conclusion

title: How to Log In Bank Of Ceylon Online Banking
description:
Logging into Bank of Ceylon (BOC) online banking is a straightforward process, offering customers the convenience of managing their accounts and transactions securely. You can access BOC online banking either through the official mobile application or directly via the website.

### Using the Mobile App:
1. **Download the App**: Search for "Bank of Ceylon" on the Play Store (for Android) or App Store (for iOS) and download the official BOC app.
2. **Log In**: Open the app and enter your username and password to access your account. If you haven’t registered yet, follow the instructions within the app to create your login credentials.

### Using a Web Browser:
1. **Visit the Official Website**: Open your browser and search for "Bank of Ceylon online banking." Ensure you click on the official website link to avoid phishing sites.
2. **Select Country**: Once on the homepage, locate the flag or arrow icon and select the country where your account is registered.
3. **Navigate to Online Banking**: At the top right corner of the page, click on the "Online Banking" or "Smart Online Banking" option.
4. **Log In**: After selecting the appropriate country, you will see the login option. Click on it and enter your credentials (username and password) to access your account.

If you haven't signed up for online banking, you can find a "Register" or "Apply Online" option on the website or app. Follow the prompts to set up your account.

### Tips:
- Ensure your internet connection is secure when logging in.
- Verify that you are on the official BOC website or app to protect your information.

Latest Job Vacancies at Bank of Ceylon & People’s Bank in Sri Lanka | How to Apply & Requirements
description:
Are you looking for a stable career in banking? Explore the latest job vacancies at two of Sri Lanka’s leading banks: Bank of Ceylon (BOC) and People’s Bank. This video provides step-by-step guidance on how to apply, the qualifications required, and tips to enhance your application. Whether you’re a fresher or have some experience, these opportunities might be the perfect fit for you. Start your journey towards a successful banking career today!
